meanings.definition: Work together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The students cooperates on the group project.
meanings.sent2: The team cooperates to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The ants cooperates to build their anthill.
meanings.sent4: The gears in a clock cooperates to keep time ticking.
meanings.sent5: The bees cooperates to gather nectar for the hive.

meanings.sent1: The siblings cooperates to clean their room.
meanings.sent2: The countries cooperates to address global issues.
meanings.sent3: The birds cooperates to build a nest in the tree.
meanings.sent4: The musicians cooperates to create beautiful music.
meanings.sent5: The ants cooperates to carry a large piece of food back to the colony.

meanings.sent1: The dog cooperates by fetching the ball.
meanings.sent2: The employee cooperates with the new company policy.
meanings.sent3: The wind cooperates by blowing the sailboat forward.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle pieces cooperates to form a complete picture.
meanings.sent5: The students cooperates by following the teacher's instructions.
